text.text: The Araucaria Forest is an open forest with sparser tress. Like vanilla forests, they can be found with springs, lakes, and various caves. With only aruacaria tress, they are a fairly simple biome with not too much to gloat about. They still provide an intresting point of interest.
Of course, the main material and reason to vist is the araucaria forest is the araucaria wood.
